alert.note: Alert for Eastern Columbia River Gorge of Oregon; Foothills of the Southern Blue Mountains of Oregon; North Central Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued May 29 at 10:24AM PDT until May 29 at 10:00PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * WHERE...In Washington, Eastern Columbia River Gorge of Washington and Simcoe Highlands. In Oregon, Eastern Columbia River Gorge of Oregon, Foothills of the Southern Blue Mountains of Oregon and North Central Oregon. * WHEN...Until 10 PM PDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Columbia River Gorge of Oregon; Foothills of the Southern Blue Mountains of Oregon; North Central Oregon
